desc: At CopanTrade we emphasize in sourcing and trading extraordinary fresh green coffee from around the world. We are an independent family owned & operated importer with over 35 years of experience, collaborating with exceptional farmers to supply specialty green coffee to roasters across north America.

layout.text:
We emphasize in sourcing and trading extraordinary fresh coffee from around the world.
We are an independent family owned and operated importer with over 35 years of experience Collaborating with exceptional farmers to supply specialty green coffee to roasters across North America.
